title: Does anyone even use Team Builder now?

replies.body:
Waited 28 minutes to join a group because I wanted to Nasus. Was only me and the group owner. Could have done an ARAM or just gone into blind pick and kept dodging if I didn't get my role.

Disable blind pick Riot. It isn't hard.
Completely agree. Diable blind pick, gg.
But then we won't have pre game team fights and threats of afk because someone didn't get the role they wanted :O
I have used it a lot and it doesn't take me long to find a group unless I wanna play mid
I would use it but it takes too long to find a group and there is too much screwing around along the way with people coming and dropping etc. Would love to use it, but I lack the patience >
havent used it since it came out :/
